body_html: Since the current master is not broken with this bug (it does not track CPU allocations by default), and only broken with GDR enabled in #11392 (I registered a tracking CPU allocator to be the default one), I think it would be more suitable to put this fix into the patch.
body_text: Since the current master is not broken with this bug (it does not track CPU allocations by default), and only broken with GDR enabled in #11392 (I registered a tracking CPU allocator to be the default one), I think it would be more suitable to put this fix into the patch.
body: Since the current master is not broken with this bug (it does not track CPU allocations by default), and only broken with GDR enabled in #11392 (I registered a tracking CPU allocator to be the default one), I think it would be more suitable to put this fix into the patch.
